title: Surface Go 2 first look: 3 big upgrades
description: The Surface Go 2 is the latest small tablet from Microsoft. It has been updated with slimmer bezels, better battery life, and updated processors. The Surface Go 2 is about the same size as the 11 iPad Pro 2020 and uses the same removable keyboard from the last generation. The price will start at $399 and be available on May 12th. Stay tuned to The Verge for our full review coming soon.
